title: Correction of Previous Issue
summary: The newsletter corrects an error regarding tax breaks for local governments under the Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCR), clarifying that relief does not apply to public agencies.
compressed_content: Volume 18, Number 3 Correction Notice: Tax breaks relief does not apply to public agencies. Editorial Contact Information: Eric T. Quinn and Joseph F. Quinn. Newsletter Subscription Details: firehouselawyer.com. Main Legal Update: Clarification on FFCR application.
search_text: Volume 18, Number 3 Correction Notice Families First Coronavirus Response Act public agencies tax breaks employment law
corruption_notes: Missing essential fields: date. This newsletter may have incomplete data extraction.
